english_example_sentence: Dear guests, you were going to touch that dangerous hot stove.
russian_example_sentence: Дорогие гости, вы собирались прикоснуться к той опасной горячей печи.
turkish_example_sentence: Değerli misafirler, o tehlikeli sıcak sobaya dokunacaktınız.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Değerli misafirler, o tehlikeli sıcak sobaya ______.
